amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete language that prohibits any appropriated funds from being used to pay for abortions of incarcerated women, except when the life of the woman is endangered, or in cases of rape.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 54 in the Congressional Record of July 25, 1995, to delete the provisions in the bill that prohibit any appropriated funds from being used to pay for abortions of incarcerated women, except when the life of the woman is endangered, or in cases of rape.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norton amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 146 - 281 (Roll no. 574).
